local_intent: Perceive the green bin and its lid, move above the lid by 5 cm, align at the front edge with tight tolerance, and confirm the lid remains visible.
assumptions: Bin and lid are reachable and unobstructed
coherence_with_global: Implements the perception and approach phases of the global plan (detect bin and lid, move above, align to front edge, verify visibility) using identical targets and parameter bins.
